# [Interview #977: Cosmere Q&A - 17th Shard, Entry #123](https://www.theoryland.com/intvmain.php?i=977#123)

#### Yamato

What is your favorite of your own books?

#### Brandon Sanderson

I can never answer this. It's like trying to choose your favorite child.
